attributes.action: Call on all service areas  to rescind parking charges for HGV drivers
attributes.background: The government need to call on all  service areas to rescind charges for HGV drivers, charges to park for a 24hr period range from £28 - £40 coupled with a charge in some areas for anything over 35 mins of £1 per hour considering a driver's break is a statutory 45 mins companies are profiteering

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for the companies involved.
